title: Six SGC Graded T206 St. Louis Cardinals FS - ALL SOLD!
author: Beatles Guy

posts.post_title: Six SGC Graded T206 St. Louis Cardinals FS - ALL SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Thinning out the herd so to speak, so I am offering up this six card lot of T206 Cardinals for sale (my reflection not included).  They are now individually priced.  You can take the entire lot for $130.00 dlvd.  Paypal please.  Price includes Priority Mail shipping, insurance, and delivery confirmation.  Thanks for stopping by.
